Articles.Content: Title says it- cant find subassembly loader for .20. Help!

The .20 Compatible and Incompatible incomplete mods list has a fix listed for the subassembly loader in version .20.

Note: it's only a temp fix for now, the mod-maker will likely release a compatible version sometime.

The mod hasn't officially been updated yet, its looking increasingly unlikly that it ever will be. However there is a quick and dirty fix that makes it work in 0.20 here. I don't know if you need the proper release as well but that would be here.

Edit: SweetAbsinthe you ninj'd me that time, one all.

The mod hasn't officially been updated yet, its looking increasingly unlikly that it ever will be....

Sorry for being slightly off topic, but why's that?
No need anymore, with the new editor logic.
Ok it works now, thanks much all!
while the new editor logic is a step in the right direction i disagree that it renders subassembly loader moot

while the new editor logic is a step in the right direction i disagree that it renders subassembly loader moot

What exactly IS the new editor logic? And why can't I get to the subassembly loader mod? It's just a 404 error. Sorry if this is the wrong place.

SubAssembly Loader is officially gone. Squad has removed all links to it from just about every forum thread, including all of the patched versions. They even removed it from spaceport.

A new mod was released yesterday/today that has the same functionality

Here's the new mod to replace subassembly loader

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/38285-0-20-x-Subassembly-Manager

Pasted from the same question that got asked 6 hours ago
